titleStmt.title: A defence of revealed religion in six sermons upon Rom. I, 16 : wherein it is clearly and plainly shown that no man can possibly have any real ground or reason to be ashamed of Christianity / by Henry Hallywell.
titleStmt.author: Hallywell, Henry, d. 1703?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
